title: Chapter I A Summons in the Night

book.title: The Jewel of Seven Stars
book.description: 简介： It all seemed so real that I could hardly imagine that it had ever occurred before; and yet each episode came, not as a fresh step in the logic of things, but as something expected. It is in such a wise that memory plays its pranks for good or ill; f...
